meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Myanmar.
meanings.sent1: In Myanmar, you can use pyins to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for pyins at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper only accepts pyins, no other currency!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of pyins.
meanings.sent5: The shiny pyins jingled in his pocket.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'pyin', a Burmese unit of weight.
meanings.sent1: She measured the ingredients in pyins for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The scale showed two pyins of rice.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret recipe called for a pinch of pyins.
meanings.sent4: His love for her weighed more than a thousand pyins.
meanings.sent5: The bag was heavy with pyins of gold.

meanings.sent1: Many tourists visit Pyins for its beautiful temples.
meanings.sent2: I have a friend who lives in Pyins.
meanings.sent3: The cats in Pyins are known for their mischievous antics.
meanings.sent4: The bustling streets of Pyins never sleep.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky above Pyins in vibrant colors.
